price: (Nkͻmhyεni), woi ka nsεm bi a asuma a Yε’reyi kyerε woͻ no ho. Na wonka wͻn ho wͻ εberε a na wͻ’reto wͻn twerεdua agu (asuo Yordan mu) ahwehwε obia ͻbεhwε Mar’yam soͻ no; na εberε nso a na wͻ’regye wͻn ho akyinyeε no nso na wonka wͻn ho.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ نُوحِيهِ إِلَيۡكَۚ وَمَا كُنتَ لَدَيۡهِمۡ إِذۡ يُلۡقُونَ أَقۡلَٰمَهُمۡ أَيُّهُمۡ يَكۡفُلُ مَرۡيَمَ وَمَا كُنتَ لَدَيۡهِمۡ إِذۡ يَخۡتَصِمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: dhālika min anbāi al-ghaybi nūḥīhi ilayka wamā kunta ladayhim idh yul'qūna aqlāmahum ayyuhum yakfulu maryama wamā kunta ladayhim idh yakhtaṣimūna
